sourcesContent:
Register

{{ errorMessage }}
Email is required. Please enter a valid email.
Password is required. Password must be at least 6 characters long.
First name is required.
Last name is required.
Location is required.
Mobile number is required. Enter a valid 10-digit mobile number.

Already have an account? Sign In

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../../../core/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { errorMessage: string = ''; // To display errors in UI constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) { } onRegister(form: any): void { if (form.valid) { this.authService.register(form.value).subscribe({ next: () => { alert('Registration successful! Please log in.'); this.router.navigate(['/auth/sign-in']); // Redirect to login page }, error: (error) => { this.errorMessage = error.message || 'An error occurred during registration.'; console.error('Registration Error:', error); } }); } else { this.errorMessage = 'Please fill out all required fields.'; } } }
